text.content: Due to Institute policy, minors (under 18) who are not students at Georgia Tech may not attend HackGT 7.
Mentoring at HackGT 7
All sponsor representatives can mentor at HackGT 7!
Judging at HackGT 7

If you're affiliated with one of the following companies, then you can sign up to judge your company's sponsor challenge: Anthem Insurance Companies, Inc., BlackRock, Inc., Capital One, Create-X, Clinton Global Initiative, Facebook, General Motors, GT Engineering for Social Innovation, Hacks/Hackers, IBM, Microsoft, NCR, News Hacks, NewsQ, NSIN, and the Tow-Knight Center for Entrepreneurial Journalism.

Additionally, representatives from these companies can judge the HackGT 7 Overall awards: Anthem Insurance Companies, Inc., BlackRock, Inc., Create-X, Clinton Global Initiative, General Motors, GT Engineering for Social Innovation, IBM, Microsoft, NCR, NSIN, and Wayfair.
When you click submit, your application will be processed immediately.  Please check your email for information about next steps.
